A supplement to The asses complaint against Balaam; or The cry of the country against ignorant and scandalous ministers. Asses complaint against Balaam Griffin, Lewis.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
s.n., [London : 1661?]
Signed: Written by Lewis Griffin. Imprint suggested by Wing. Verse: "A vaunt ye smooth-tongu'd flatterers of the age ..." Reproduction of original in the British Library.
